summary: Frontend testing completed for React ERP application - Production tracking system. All requested features tested successfully: Login, Production tab navigation, Station selection, Planning page, and Excel export button.
critical_code_review_comments: Kademeli metre aktarımı (cascading meterage transfer) implementation is correct - previous station's output meterage becomes next station's input meterage
Mobile Excel export uses Blob-based download with iOS Safari special handling
Production station flow properly filters stations by order category (Etiket/Ambalaj)

success_rate.backend: N/A - Backend testing skipped as requested

seed_data_creation: No seed data created - used existing data (3 planned orders: SP-0590, SP-0589, SP-0588)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. Login works with provided credentials. Production page has station selector with Etiket and Ambalaj categories. Planning page shows planned orders with Excel export button visible when order is selected. Mobile view tested and working.

production_tab.details: Üretim tab clickable and navigates to Production Dashboard

station_selection.details: Station selector dropdown works with all stations: Etiket İstasyonları (Bobst M1 Operatörü, Kalite Kontrol) and Ambalaj İstasyonları (Bobst M1 Operatörü, Hibrit Operatörü, Mühürleme, Sleeve Kalite Kontrol, Tabakalama)

planning_page.details: Planning page loads with Planlama Bekleyen (0) and Planlanan İşler (3) tabs

excel_export_button.details: Excel export button 'İş Emri Formu Yazdır (Excel)' visible and clickable for planned orders

mobile_excel_export.details: Excel export button visible and functional on mobile viewport (390x844)

kademeli_metre_aktarimi.details: Code review confirms cascading meterage transfer implementation is correct - previous station output becomes next station input
